tool_description: Find out about the winning numbers in the latest lotto.
title: Lottery

api_list.name: millipiyango
api_list.description: Service that brings you the full list of Milli Piyango.

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: Enter the date you would like to know the results (Format: 'YYYYMMDD')

set-cookie: __cfduid=d232b52bcc238537c1220c1c9583486661586506953; expires=Sun, 10-May-20 08:22:33 GMT; path=/; domain=.collectapi.com; HttpOnly; SameSite=Lax; Secure

api_list.name: onNumara
api_list.description: Service bringing numerical On Numara results.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lottery2.p.rapidapi.com/onNumara"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lottery2.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
